Scenarios.name: Common Bias assistant
Scenarios.executerMessage: Your task is to receive feedback from the other agent and then answer the user's questions.

agents.name: biasAssistant
agents.systemMessage: Check if there is bias in the executer's answer. If so, let the executer know.

agents.name: ethicalExpertAssistant
